title: Vod
author: Vod
content: I went to visit to look at advertising on the refresh profile, but the page is 500.   Everything ok?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Just check it from my end and everything appear to be normal Are you sure you visited the right url ?? https://bpip.org/or there is something else displaying from your own end? Current screenshot from mobile view

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on November 11, 2023, 11:17:22 PMAre you sure you visited the right url ?? The irony if Vod forget the url of his own creation. Honestly speaking though it work for me too, even when clicking the "refresh profile" too.I'm not so sure what's the look of it, but this is how it shows to me

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on November 11, 2023, 11:17:22 PMJust check it from my end and everything appear to be normal Are you sure you visited the right url ?? Considering that Vod founded BPIP, probably. No 500 error on my end, but all it says is:"This free profile refresh brought to you by: Sponsorships" (link to https://bpip.org/sponsor.aspx)

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Same here the site works to me he might be accessing the wrong URL or the bpip.com or maybe the browser(Tor browser?) itself I'm using chrome browser it also works on firefox browser.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on November 11, 2023, 11:23:32 PMQuote from: Nwada001 on November 11, 2023, 11:17:22 PMAre you sure you visited the right url ?? The irony if Vod forget the url of his own creation. Guess what? It didn’t even occur to me that it was the creator, or, shall I say, I never even knew who was behind the Bpip idea in the first place until now, as I have been using it over the year without realising this.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on November 11, 2023, 11:27:37 PMGuess what? It didn’t even occur to me that it was the creator, or, shall I say, I never even knew who was behind the Bpip idea in the first place until now, as I have been using it over the year without realising this.No hard feelings though but now you know  Quote from: Marvelman on November 11, 2023, 11:35:25 PMVod, you're back? Cool!  Yeah, i even tried to click his profile page and post history if its really him lol

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Lord Vod, everything Okay? Nice to have you back here. Been a while

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on November 11, 2023, 11:23:32 PMThe irony if Vod forget the url of his own creation. LOL!Looks like it was a temp glitch.   Can one of the team contact me (outside forum) for advertising info?Quote from: logfiles on November 11, 2023, 11:47:07 PMLord Vod, everything Okay? Nice to have you back here. Been a while  Wow, thanks for warm welcome guys.  I'd merit, but my stash has vanished.   Did they remove that feature?I'm not sure how long I'll be here.  I'm exposing the administrator as a felon, so he's going to have to take control of his trust by some nefarious method.    I am the only member never to be removed from DT.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: It happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 02:54:16 AMIt happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.Nothing from my side either. Everything looked normal.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 02:54:16 AMIt happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.It worked fine on my end as well -- firefox with vpn onDoes the problem persist with a different browser, on a different device and/or internet connection? If you have a VPN enabled, playing with servers and disabling might help as well.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on November 14, 2023, 04:00:58 AMDoes the problem persist with a different browser, on a different device and/or internet connection? If you have a VPN enabled, playing with servers and disabling might help as well.Even without vpn everything works perfectly. probably the url of vod was not correct and that was why the error message was sent to him and I believe by now he has ratified the problem and have access to the to the site. And there are sometimes network also caused such error message to occur. If the network is not too strong or bad you can't visit some site because they used strong network to browse. I have not experienced BPIP site is down in a day. When I browse it, it works fine move smoothly.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on November 11, 2023, 11:37:15 PMYeah, i even tried to click his profile page and post history if its really him lolHe was back yesterday to pick up where he left off with his feud with OgNasty, just like the last time he returned.  Don't know if Vod is back for good, but I hope so (drama about alleged misuse of forum funds aside).  He was a very positive influence on the forum for years, especially in the lending section and other places where scammers tend to lurk.BPIP is working just fine for me, but that was probably just a brain fart on Vod's part.  You're allowed a few of those, Vod.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 02:54:16 AMIt happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.Okay then you can try this to see if it will open for you  https://bpip.org/Profile?p=Vod and also change the browser too. I normally use Google Chrome to check it and it is working fine from my end. I just checked your profile and everything is intact. You can check the internet protocol and the IP address or you can change device to check it again. Everyone here has said it is working from their sides and it is only you having the problem then the issue is from your site. I wish you good navigation time in the forum.

comments.author: FinePoine0
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 02:54:16 AMIt happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.The bpip was at the correct level when I entered.  Maybe it is normal to have error temporarily due to network problem for some time. Such problems are sometimes encountered on the Bitcointalk forum. I think it's normal to encounter such problems, maybe due to development work or network problems.

comments.author: AprilioMP
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 14, 2023, 02:54:16 AMIt happened again. I visit the site, it whirrs for about 20 seconds, then give a 500 error.   If I then try to reload it works fine.Nothing happened when I accessed the bpip.org site, even when I refreshed my profile.The only difference before and after refreshing the profile is the change in Last Parsed in the general information section of my profile ID.The short sentence is that there was no 500 error on my part.Thank YouOr maybe there is another meaning that is beyond my reach?

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: If after trying the link at @Mate sent you and you still have issues, probably you can wait a few minutes then try again. Either the issue is from your browser or something is just acting up because mine works perfectly fine. Welcome back from you deep slumber party, we hope to see more of you as you input was missed.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on November 11, 2023, 11:14:55 PMI went to visit to look at advertising on the refresh profile, but the page is 500.   Everything ok?I also have bpip running very smoothly here. your issue may be caused by a browser cache or cookie issue, a network connection issue, or a browser extension issue. So you can check them and reset these things. This problem seems to be only from your side. Because I read the comments here I realized no one else is having the same problem, including me.
